text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly addresses the concept of shared responsibility and control under the Regulatory Reform (Fire Safety) Order 2005. It discusses the applicant's role as the 'Responsible Person' (Article 9/8) and specifically highlights the need to demonstrate coordination arrangements under shared occupancy, which directly relates to Article 22 of the FSO 2005.
